abstract: Forget about one possible white knight for Potash as it tries to fend off a hostile bid from BHP Billiton. Vale, the big Brazilian mining company, denied that it was in talks to acquire the giant Canadian fertilizer company.
snippet: Forget about one possible white knight for Potash as it tries to fend off a hostile bid from BHP Billiton. Vale, the big Brazilian mining company, denied that it was in talks to acquire the giant Canadian fertilizer company.
lead_paragraph: Forget about one possible white knight for Potash. Vale, the big Brazilian mining company, denied on Monday afternoon that it was in talks to acquire the giant Canadian fertilizer company.

headline.main: Vale Denies It Is Potash’s White Knight
